meta.title: Form Timepicker
meta.description: BootstrapVue custom time picker input form control, which provides full WAI-ARIA acessibility (a11y) and supports internationalization (i18n)

args.description: A string in the format of `HH:mm:ss` (24 hour format). Used to update the v-model

aliases.description: `b-time` context event. Emitted when the user changes any spinbutton value via mouse or cursor control

args.description: The `b-time` context object. See the `b-time` documentaion for details
